fields.name: Passives:
fields.value:
- Motivation: Whenever you kill a player, draw 1 satcheled card.
- Recover: Whenever you end a phase with an empty hand, draw an extra card.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Holy Power: Pick a player. If they do not win with you, Impale?! them at the end of the phase. Influenceable. [1 use, Unique, UOR3]
- Divination: Turn all cards in your hand into attacking cards. [1 use, Unique]
- Aggression: Draw a random non-special attacking card. [2 uses, 1 CD]

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all Chaos and Outsiders who oppose your goal.
